words.source: H6213 wayyiqtol 3mp Qal of עָשָׂה 'to do, make'; KJV 'did', ESV 'did', NASB 'did'
H3651 adv. ken 'so, thus'; KJV 'so', ESV 'the same', NASB 'the same'
H2748 art. + n.mp chartom 'magician'; KJV 'the magicians', ESV 'the magicians', NASB 'the magicians'
H3909 prep. b- + n.mp lat 'secret art' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'with their enchantments', ESV 'by their secret arts', NASB 'with their secret arts'
H3318 prep. l- + Hiphil inf. construct of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'to bring forth', ESV 'to produce', NASB 'to bring forth'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H3654 art. + n.mp kinnim 'gnat, louse'; KJV 'lice', ESV 'gnats', NASB 'gnats'
H3808 conj. + neg. particle loʾ 'not'; KJV 'but they could not', ESV 'but they could not', NASB 'but they could not'
H3201 Qal perf. 3cp of יָכֹל 'to be able'; KJV 'could', ESV 'could', NASB 'could'
H1961 wayyiqtol 3fs Qal of הָיָה 'to be, become'; KJV 'there was', ESV 'so there were', NASB 'there were'
H3654 art. + n.ms kinnam 'gnat, louse' (collective); KJV 'lice', ESV 'gnats', NASB 'gnats'
H120 prep. b- + art. + n.ms ʾadam 'man, mankind'; KJV 'upon man', ESV 'on man', NASB 'on man'
